name: Order Up! - Hackathon Version
description:
This game demo was done in 48 hours as part of a workplace hackathon.

The theme was "Move"

You must deliver the food to the customer at the end of the level. Carrying the food weighs you down, so toss it into the air to gain some extra mobility. Don't be too stressed if you drop it, 5 second rule.

Controller recommended, but not required

=== CONTROLS ===

Controller:

[A] - Jump

[X] - Toss/Attack

[B] - Dive

Mouse + Keyboard:

[W,A,S,D] - Move

[Space] - Jump

[L-Click] - Toss/Attack

[R-Click] - Dive
